summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 40W, page 110, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Replat of 12th Ave. Addition, Lots 9, 10, 15 and 16, Block 2, Lots 4 and 5, Block 8, located north of East Pine St. between Melrose Ave. and alley east of Bellevue Ave., as General Commercial (CG) Zone.
